WorkItem.Description:
I have an excel sheet with a chart on and the data formula is

=(all!$C$4,all!$C$11,all!$C$18,all!$C$25,all!$C$32,all!$C$39,all!$C$46,all!$C$53,all!$C$60,all!$C$67,all!$C$74,all!$C$81)

I am getting the following error

Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'PHPExcel_Calculation_Exception' with message 'Formula Error: Unexpected ,' in /home/sites/....../phpEXCEL/PHPExcel/Calculation.php:3725 Stack trace: #0 /home/sites/...../phpEXCEL/PHPExcel/Calculation.php(2902): PHPExcel_Calculation->_raiseFormulaError('Formula Error: ...') #1 /home/sites/......./phpEXCEL/PHPExcel/Calculation.php(2404): PHPExcel_Calculation->_parseFormula('(all!$C$4,all!$...', Object(PHPExcel_Cell)) #2 /home/sites/....../phpEXCEL/PHPExcel/Chart/DataSeriesValues.php(288): PHPExcel_Calculation->_calculateFormulaValue('=(all!$C$4,all!...', NULL, Object

I am using 1.8.0 of phpExcel, please find excel file attached can anyone explain the problem, or
have I found a bug?
